name: Mission: Imp-possible
description:
Deep in the haunted jungles of Carbadûr lies the ruins of an ancient temple to a forgotten god. Rumors of treasure, stashed away within the bowels of the temple have been whispered about for years, but no one has braved the expedition and returned.

Enter the Brave Wizard Melchor! An expert demon-summoner, Melchor decides to venture into the foreboding temple, using his infinite imps to solve the puzzles hidden within and find the treasure for himself.

Keyboard or Gamepad Supported

Keyboard Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD to move X or Space to Jump

Created in 48 hours during the 2016 Global Game Jam in St Louis, Mo
